document_data.mainbody: ''casting ground''' was a landmark with unique properties, to be called up by those who knew the method.{{cite book/Secrets of the Magister|70}}
document_data.Notable Examples: One casting ground created by [[Aralagath Tarsil]] boosted certain [[spell]]s, and anyone who knew the methods could cast ''[[protection from evil]]'' or a floating ring of mauve-white spheres akin to ''[[faerie fire]]''.
